title: Charlotte's Web - E.B White [BBC Radio 4]
description:
E B White's - 'Charlotte's Web'
                            -  BBC R4 -

Farmer's daughter saves small new born pig from immediate slaughter. Then
a literate spider does its stuff as the pig's life is threatened again.

Cast
Avery Arable - Corbyn Thomas-Smith
Dominic Cooper - Wilbur
Edith Zuckerman - Laurence Bouvard
Fern Arable - Georgina Hagan
Goose - Colleen Prendergast
Homer Zuckerman - John Chancer
John Arable - Peter Marinker
Ken Campbell - Templeton
Little Lamb - Dominic Curran
Lurvy - Kerry Shale
Mrs Arable - Laurel Lefkow
Narrator - Peter Marinker
Old Sheep - Angela Curran
Sophie Thompson - Charlotte

Adapted by Chris Wallis & Joe Robinette
Directed by Chris Wallis
Broadcast in two parts March 22 & 23, 2005
Coded from tape at 128/44.1
